header.title: Test Recorder
header.description: Interactive test creation with browser recording. Create tests by showing the AI what to do in plain English - no coding required!

whatIsRecorder.title: üéØ What is Test Recorder?
whatIsRecorder.description: Test Recorder lets you create tests interactively by typing commands in plain English and watching the AI perform actions in a browser.

noCoding.title: ‚ú® No Coding Required!
noCoding.description: Just describe what you want to test, and the AI does the rest.

quickStart.title: üöÄ Quick Start
quickStart.description: Start recording your first test in one command

step1.title: Step 1: Test Details
step1.description: The recorder asks for basic test information:
step1.example:
Test ID: LOGIN-001
Test Name: User Login Test
Description: Test the login process
Priority: High
Tags: login, auth
Site URL: https://myapp.com

step2.title: Step 2: Give Commands
step2.description: Type what you want the AI to do:

step3.title: Step 3: Save Test
step3.description: When you type finish, the recorder:

actions.saveFile: Saves it to your tests/ folder

interactiveCommands.title: üí¨ Interactive Commands
interactiveCommands.description: Commands you can use during recording

commands.type: type "search term" in the search box

generatedTest.title: Generated Test Example
generatedTest.description: What the recorder creates for you
generatedTest.explanation: After recording, you get a complete test file like this:
generatedTest.example:
export const LOGIN_TEST = {
  id: 'LOGIN-001',
  name: 'User Login Test',
  description: 'Test the login process',
  priority: 'High',
  tags: ['login', 'auth'],
  task: `
    Navigate to https://myapp.com
    Click the "Login" button
    Fill email field: test@example.com
    Fill password field: mypassword
    Click "Submit" button
    Wait 2 seconds
    Verify dashboard appears
    Check that "Welcome" message is visible
  `
};

beDescriptive.title: ‚úÖ Be Descriptive
beDescriptive.description: Use clear element descriptions: "Login button" instead of "button"

addWaits.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Add Waits
addWaits.description: Use "wait 2 seconds" after actions that trigger loading

verifyActions.title: üîç Verify Actions
verifyActions.description: Always verify important actions succeeded: "verify login successful"

takeScreenshots.title: üì∏ Take Screenshots
takeScreenshots.description: Use "screenshot" command to capture important moments

cantFindElement.title: AI Can't Find Element
solutions: Try different wording: "login link" vs "sign in button"

browserCrashes.title: Browser Crashes
solutions: Restart the recorder: npx endorphin run test-recorder
Check if site is accessible manually
Try with a simpler site first

testNotSaving.title: Test Not Saving
solutions: Make sure you type "finish" to complete
